Don't expect a ton of menu choices at this pizzeria. In fact, don't expect any choices at all. They serve one type of...
A hugely popular Berkeley institution draws throngs with its artisanal organic pizza.
With a chewy, sourdough-crust topped with gourmet cheese, it's no wonder this pizza is the East Bay's favorite.
